tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE past_legal_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR,
    case_date DATE,
    plaintiff VARCHAR,
    defendant VARCHAR,
    outcome VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Legal_Cases (
 case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_name VARCHAR(255),
 court_name VARCHAR(255),
 case_type VARCHAR(50),
 case_outcome VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ML_Model (
 model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 model_name VARCHAR(255),
 model_type VARCHAR(50),
 features_used VARCHAR(255),
 accuracy DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE legal_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name STRING,
    case_type STRING,
    court_location STRING,
    case_status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
    lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name STRING,
    lawyer_specialty STRING,
    law_firm STRING,
    admitted_to_bar_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LegalCases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    case_type TEXT,
    case_date TIMESTAMP,
    plaintiff_name TEXT,
    defendant_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CaseRulings (
    ruling_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id UUID REFERENCES LegalCases(case_id),
    judge_name TEXT,
    ruling_date TIMESTAMP,
    verdict TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MLModels (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    model_type TEXT,
    train_data_set TEXT,
    test_data_set TEXT
);
